title: 10 Best One Piece Episodes That Will Make Any Viewer an Instant Fan
author: ScreenRant Editorial
description: Article highlighting Episode 278 as one of the best episodes in One Piece. It delves into the most tragic parts of Robin's backstory and includes iconic moments like Robin finally claiming she wants to live and Luffy declaring war against the World Government.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Robin's backstory and the declaration of war

title: 20 Best One Piece Episodes To Rewatch
author: CBR Editorial
description: CBR article stating that Episode 278 is one that One Piece fans hold especially close to their hearts and includes what is arguably the most emotional moment in the entire series: Nico Robin's desperate cry to live. The emotional weight is further heightened by the Straw Hat Pirates officially declaring war against the World Government.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Robin's emotional moment and declaration of war

title: I WANT TO LIVE! One Piece Episode 276, 277 & 278 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Combined reaction and review video covering Episodes 276-278, focusing on Robin's backstory conclusion and the iconic 'I want to live' declaration.

title: "I WANT TO LIVE!" ROBIN'S BACKSTORY PART 4!! | One Piece Episode 278 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Couples Reaction Channel
description: Couples reaction and discussion video focusing on the emotional climax of Robin's backstory in Episode 278.

title: I WANT TO LIVE! (THIS BROKE ME...) | One Piece Episode 278 REACTION
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Emotional reaction video to Episode 278, highlighting the heartbreaking and triumphant nature of Robin's declaration.

title: I WANT TO LIVE! | One Piece Ep 277/278 Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Recent reaction and discussion video covering Episodes 277-278, posted approximately 3 weeks ago (as of search date).

title: One Piece Episode 278 UNCUT REACTION / Declaration of War Against The World Government
author: Cruz Brothers React
description: Uncut reaction video from Cruz Brothers React focusing on the declaration of war against the World Government moment.

title: Anime Corner Tweet Comparing Episodes 278 and 1071
author: Anime Corner
description: Tweet comparing Episode 278 (Luffy declares war on the World Government in 2006) with Episode 1071 (from 2023), highlighting the significance of Episode 278 in One Piece history.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains references to both Episode 278 and Episode 1071

title: "I Want To Live:" Nico Robin's Most Iconic One Piece Moment Is About To Make Everyone Emotional Again
author: ScreenRant Editorial
description: Article discussing how Nico Robin's iconic 'I want to live' moment from Episode 278 is set to be recreated in the live-action adaptation, highlighting the cultural impact of this scene.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains discussion of Robin's emotional moment

title: 278 & 284: "Say You Want to Live! We Are Your Friends!!" and "I'm Not Gonna Hand Over the Blueprints! Franky's Decision!"
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: Blog post discussion of Episodes 278 and 284 from the perspective of someone experiencing One Piece for the first time, capturing the emotional impact of these episodes.
